Text:
just making the request here to:P 

Yo danger boy longtime fan of your stuff, good, easy an d always work. Are there a ME2 pack in the works, with overlord, firepower and lair of the shadowbroker in the works when they are all released?

Keep up the good work;)
Mass Effect 2 has an amazing soundtrack. Thanks for the upload :)
Mass effect 2 soundtrack is awesome, thanks
there's an audiobook on here somewhere for those of you who are love with this storyline
The most epic game soundtrack iÂ´ve ever heard. "Suicide Mission" and "The End Run" rulezz. Thx for upload.
Hey do you have the soundtrack for Mass Effect 1?

Words cannot describe how epic this soundtrack is. I just can't get enough of The Suicide Mission and The Illusive Man. Lets hope ME3 soundtrack will be the most epic-ness out of the three. Thank you.

It's a very good soundtrack. Jack Wall did a superb job, and I'm sorry he won't be returning for ME3.

The audio quality is listenable. However, I don't think it actually sounds like V0 MP3. There are way too many artifacts, particularly on the heavy percussion. It sounds more like someone re-encoded the game's original Ogg Vorbis tracks (~94 kb/s) to MP3 to ease mass consumption. I could be wrong, though.

-_-'

Why upload mp3's in VBR...

Yes, I'm an Audio Nut; FLAC or 320, I'll go as low as 128 if it's distortion-free. VBR's are notoriously filled with pops/clicks.

I'll give this a go though, because I really do love the music.

-though, I do still wonder why people rip in VBR; not like storage or connection speeds matter anymore :(
DLing this whilst seeding ME1's OST.... boss. xD
